venue.name: The Boston Park Plaza Hotel & Towers

item.description:
Location: Berkley room - mezzanine level of Park Plaza

Time: from 5:30pm-8pm

Theme:

Data as a new kind of electricity conducted via hyperlinks.

Moderator: Kingsley Idehen (@kidehen)

Agenda:


1. General state of affairs update re. Linked Data as it applies to:
-- Data Publishing
-- Data Consumption 
-- Applications (e.g., Read-Write Web facilitation via efforts such as the WebID authentication protocol and Web Resource Access Policies & Control)


2. Demo fest -- I want to encourage attendees to put out a live Linked Data URI, and then have others work with said URI -- think in terms of a relay where a Linked Data URI is the baton .
item.name: Linked Data Meetup at ISWC 2012
